apps.desc: Lists all the apps of a client.

apt.desc: Install Packages on the linux instance of your Application.

cleardm.desc: Clear all messages sent by the bot in your direct messages.

gift.desc: Activate a gift plan in DisCloud.

git.desc: Synchronize a git repository to your application for automatic updates.

help.desc: Lists all existing commands in the bot.

memory.desc: Change the maximum RAM memory consumed by an application.

mod.desc: Perform various functions related to the moderator system.

ping.desc: View the latency of your application.

plans.desc: View all available plans and their benefits.

removeapp.desc: Delete your instance, deleting all data and settings.

resetweek.desc: Reset the time when your app will shut down.

status.desc: View the status of an application.

subdomain.desc: Register or remove a subdomain in DisCloud.

terminal.desc: Displays the terminal of your application.

transfer.desc: Activate a plan by gift in DisCloud.

up.desc: Upload in your app on DisCloud.

upconfig.desc: Upload an application to the DisCloud with the discloud.config file.

upsite.desc: Upload your site to the DisCloud.

version.desc: Edit the version of the language used in your application.
